## EthersSfStablecoinStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.ethersconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EthersSfStablecoinStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledSfStablecoinStore](./stablecoin-lib-ethers.blockpolledsfstablecoinstore.md) will be created.
